name: Cultivation of plants and shrooms
description:
In this game you foloow the instructions of an ancient tome that guides you trough the vast knowvledge of herbalism. Your goal is to evlove plants by planting them on the remains of other plants.

This game can be played with only a mouse. Playing in full-screen is adviced!

Made by:
Csaba Sárdi - 3d,  programming,  gameplay
Tamara Schnetzer - textures
Márton Mester - music
Ágoston Batovszki - voice acting
